desc: Added: Rough translation for Carlotta's and Roccia's kit
Added: Translated effects for Death and Dance (Carlotta's Signature), Tragicomedy (Roccia's Signature), and Echo of the Deep
3 New Weapons (including Carlotta's and Roccia's Signature
Fixed: Base ATK of Weapon's Tooltips in modal were wrong
Added: Ability type below icons for clarity
Added: Now the entire row of modifier can be clicked to toggle the checkbox or focus the text box
Added: Some ATK/DMG buffs that only affect a single ability type now only affects that specific ability
Fixed: Lumi's I2 causing the app to crash
Fixed: Heron and Moonlit Clouds buffs toggled off after leaving page
Fixed: Missing Stellar Symphony's ATK modifier
Fixed: Fusion RES and Glacio RES were swapped
